c74object.name: abc.musdur
c74object.description: abc.musdur is an abstraction to set the duration of a delay line as a musical duration. As a bpatcher, it includes one defaut value: the index of the duration chosen (0 for a whole, 1 for a half, 2 for a quarter, 3 for an 8th, 4 for a 16th, 5 for a 32nd, 6 for a triplet).

objarg.name: init-value
objarg.description: first argument is the initial value in the menu [init=1, min=1, max=6, step=1].
